title: How to Craft a Loom to Make Silk in Terraria

steps.title: Craft a workbench and place it down.
steps.content: Craft a workbench and place it down. You'll need 10 wood blocks to craft it. Use an axe on nearby trees to get wood blocks. You can also find work benches by looting Dungeons and Underground Cabins . Be sure to place down the crafting stations in a protected house to avoid enemies.

steps.title: Craft a furnace and place it down.
steps.content: Craft a furnace and place it down. You'll need 20 stone blocks, 4 wood blocks, and 3 torches to craft it. Stone blocks can be obtained by using the pickaxe on nearby stone. To craft a torch, you'll need 1 wood block and 1 gel. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Craft an anvil and place it down.
steps.content: Craft an anvil and place it down. You'll need 5 iron bars or 5 lead bars to craft it. You can also use an anvil to craft weapons needed to beat bosses and prepare for hardmode .

steps.title: Craft a sawmill and place it down.
steps.content: Craft a sawmill and place it down. You'll need a 1 chain, 10 wood blocks, and 2 iron bars to craft a sawmill. [2] X Research source To craft a chain at the anvil, you'll need 1 iron bar. Make sure all three crafting stations are placed beside each other. Interact with the workbench to find the sawmill icon.

steps.title: Craft a loom.
steps.content: Craft a loom. You'll need 12 wood blocks. Interact with the sawmill to craft it. You can now place the loom and use it for crafting.

steps.title: Looms can sometimes be found in Underground Cabins.
steps.content: Looms can sometimes be found in Underground Cabins. These Cabins hold tons of treasure, and they'll reflect the biome they're in. In addition to chests of arrows, tools, and materials, it's possible to find a loom within the Cabin. The number of Underground Cabins depends on the size of the player's world. This number is limited; rooms do not spawn again.

steps.title: Looms can be used to craft Silk and vanity items.
steps.content: Looms can be used to craft Silk and vanity items. You can craft Silk using 7 cobwebs. Vanity items include robes, garments, helmets, hats, and more. Each item will require different ingredients to craft. Silk can also be used to craft a Bed, which is needed to set a new spawn point, sleep, and regenerate health.
